home.help_msg: We are going to help you to check your device.

analysis.question: Do you want to analyze the captured communications?
analysis.some_time_msg: Yes, it can take some time...

generate-ap.tap_msg: Tap the white frame to generate a new network.
generate-ap.generate_ap_msg: We generate an ephemeral network for you.
generate-ap.error_msg1:
Unfortunately, we got some issues
during the AP creation.
generate-ap.error_msg2:
Please check that you have configured the right
network interfaces in the back-end.

report.stalkerware_msg:
Your device is compromised by
a Stalkerware, please check the report.
report.location_msg:
An application is sharing your
current geolocation with a third party.
report.high_msg:
You have {nb} high alert,
your device seems to be compromised.
report.moderate_msg:
You have {nb} moderate alerts,
your device might be compromised.
report.low_msg:
You have only {nb} low alerts,
don't hesitate to check them.

save-capture.please_connect: Please connect a USB key to save your capture.
save-capture.tap_msg: You can tap the USB key to start a new capture.
save-capture.capture_download: The capture download is going to start...

modals.want_to_quit: Do you want to leave the application?
modals.please_give_the_password: Please enter the password for the network:
modals.want_to_whitelist:
Do you want to add {host} to the whitelist
for the next analysis?
